page.title: 15Susans Day Cont
page.content: we had was reading for fifteen minutes, then Mr.Bohn, our teacher, gave out a new test-sheet which looked hard but was quite easy.It took me twenty four minutes, twenty five seconds and I got 80% which is quite high for me.When everyone had finished we talked about what we had to revise for the exams and we made out a list at playtime.During break I played tig with my friends until the bell rang and I went back to class, where I practised some long-division sums. At dinner, my class had lunch first because we were going swimming at ten past one.After lunch I ran back to class because it was raining, so I played indoors until swimming.When Mr.Bohn came to the classroom, we all lined up at the door and waited for the coach.When it arrived, we all got
